item.title: Twitter Updates for 2010-01-11
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
• I'm at Noir at the Charles Hotel (1 Bennett St, at Eliot, Cambridge). #
  • I'm at Cambridge, 1. (Harvard Square) (27 Church Street, Cambridge). #
  • I'm at Finale - Harvard Square (30 Dunster St, Mt Auburn St, Cambridge). #
  • FictFact.com's book details page has a new design! More book info, places to find the book and local search. #
  • The Walt Disney Org Chart - #
